editorialDecl.p: This record created following the Syriaca.org guidelines. Documentation available at: http://syriaca.org/documentation.

interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period
Names or terms Romanized into English according to the standards adopted by the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage

bibl.title: Romans (Peshitta Version)
Romans
ܫܠܡܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܪ̈ܗܘܡܝܐ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ ܡܢ ܩܘܪܢܬܘܣ ܒܝܕ ܦܘܒܐ ܡܫܡܫܢܝܬܐ. ܐܝܬ ܒܗ̇ ܦܬ̈ܓܡܐ ܐܠܦܐ ܘܡܐܬܝܢ ܘܚܡܫܐ .ܘ:ܘ.
The Epistle of Romans, according to the Peshitta version
ܫܠܡܬ. ܐܓܪܬܐ. ܕܠܘܬ. ܪ̈ܗܘܡܝܐ. ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ. ܡܢ. ܩܘܪܢܬܘܣ. ܘܗܘܝܐ. ܬܡܢܡܐܐ. ܘܥܣܪܝܢ. ܘܚܡܫܐ. ܦܬܓ̈ܡܝܢ: .
ܫܠܡܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܪ̈ܗܘܡܝܐ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ ܡܢ ܪܗܘܡܐ. ܘ .
ܫܠ̣ܡܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܪ̈ܗܘܡܝܐ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ ܡܢ ܩܘܪܢܬܘܣ ܘܐܫܬܕܪܬ ܒܐܝ̈ܕܝ ܦܘܒܐ ܡܫܡܫܢܝܬܐ
New Testament. Romans 7.3-10.4
Romans, according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of S. Paul to the Romans, according to the Peshitta version,
ܫܠܡܬ: ܐܓܪܬܐ: ܕܠܘܬ: ܪ̈ܗܘܡܝܐ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ: ܡܢ
Epistle of S. Paul to the Romans, ch. i. 1-11, according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of Romans
The Epistle of S. Paul to the Romans, according to the Peshitta version, ch. i. 1—iv. 16.
The Epistle of S. Paul to the Romans, according to the Peshitta version, ch. v. 12— vi. 22.

bibl.date: It is dated A. Gr. 1565, A.D. 1254.
